sentences.en: Every organized patriarchal religion works overtime to contribute its own brand of misogyny ( Robin Morgan )
sentences.cn: 每一种有组织的男权信仰都不遗余力地贡献出自身的厌女标记 ( 罗宾摩根 )

sentences.en: Nativism, xenophobia, racism, Islamophobia and misogyny are all on the rise. If the voices of intolerance prevail, the world risks entering a dark era.
sentences.cn: 本土主义、排外主义、种族主义、恐伊斯兰症和厌女症都在增加。如果不宽容的声音占上风，这个世界恐怕要进入一段黑暗时期。

sentences.en: They couldn't believe that the America they knew could embrace someone who mocked a disabled man, bragged about sexually assaulting women, and spouted misogyny, racism and anti-Semitism.
sentences.cn: 他们不相信美国人民会拥抱一个嘲笑残疾人，吹嘘性骚扰女性，喷洒厌恶女性观点，种族主义和反犹太的人。

trans.tran_en: Misogyny is a strong dislike of women
